ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISBLANK(RW_Project_Unit__c), ISNULL(RW_Project_Unit__c)), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Cancelled"), !ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "Cancellation Initiated"), ISCHANGED(StageName ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This stage can not be Cancelled as project unit is not tagged.
